name: Apple Inc.
description: American technology company specializing in consumer electronics.

description: American multinational corporation manufacturing vehicles and vehicle parts.

description: American electric vehicle and clean energy company.

description: American multinational energy corporation involved in oil, gas, and geothermal energy.

name: United Airlines
description: Major American airline headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Coca-Cola Co.
description: Iconic beverage manufacturer and marketer.

description: Global leader in athletic footwear and apparel.

name: Visa
description: Multinational financial services corporation facilitating electronic funds transfers.

name: Procter & Gamble
description: American multinational consumer goods corporation.

name: Disney
description: Diversified multinational mass media and entertainment conglomerate.

name: Bitcoin
description: Decentralized digital currency without a central bank.

name: Ethereum
description: Decentralized blockchain with smart contract functionality.

name: Litecoin
description: Cryptocurrency similar to Bitcoin but with faster transaction confirmation.

name: Ripple
description: Digital payment protocol more known for its digital currency, XRP.

description: Decentralized blockchain supporting decentralized finance solutions.

name: Shiba Inu
description: Decentralized meme token that evolved into a vibrant ecosystem.

description: Major trading classification of sweet light crude oil.

name: Sugar

name: Wheat

name: S&P 500 Index
